name: Tactics & Strategy Master 2:Princess of Holy Light（圣光战姬）
description: -Beautiful girls -A retro style turn-based wargame -Nearly 200 missions of varying difficulty wait for you -200 different weapons -A highly liberal game of chess -A combination of many active and passive skills -Supports Traditional Chinese, and English
